Description: A new kind of private social media platform.
Full Description: Porchlight is a communication platform that is changing the way we connect by eliminating the noise of our busy world and putting meaningful connection back in our daily lives.  FB/Insta/Snap for our public lives, LinkedIn for our public careers and Porchlight for meaningful connection to people and resources that impact our quality of life.   Connection is what makes us human.  Access to people doesn't equate to meaningful connection, health or happiness.  That's why anxiety, depression and suicide are all on the rise.  Teens are overwhelmed by the constant scrutiny of public lives, adult are too busy to connect and over 42 million elderly experiencing chronic isolation.  It is the lack of meaningful connection with the right people and resources at the right time that is the problem.  The impacts are far more than just social.  Isolation and loneliness, created by the lack of meaningful connection, caused over $6.7B in PREVENTABLE costs to the healthcare system in 2018.  Meaningful connection matters, and we need a new tool to make it happen. Porchlight is a platform that creates a strong engagement channel for us to stay connected to the important people in our lives.  This foundation alone is proven to have dramatic impacts on our quality of life and the cost of healthcare.  The real value is created by helping people gain insights and access to outside resources based on their goals and interaction history.  Porchlight's high engagement communication channel puts users in the position to partner with coaches, support groups and integrated healthcare systems to stay healthy and drive down healthcare cost. Porchlight is a contrarian approach to connection that creates an efficient way for us to have access to the people and resources that can help us live the life we choose.  Join us!

Industries: Biotechnology, Health Care, Innovation Management, Therapeutics, Wellness
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Professional Services, Science and Engineering
Description: BioVie is pioneering an innovative technology.
Full Description: BioVie is pioneering an innovative therapeutic approach targeting ascites due to liver cirrhosis. Ascites, or the accumulation of fluid in the abdomen, is the most common complication of cirrhosis due to NASH (non-alcoholic steatohepatitis), alcoholic liver disease and/or hepatitis C.  Ascites affects about 100,000 Americans and many times more worldwide, and contributes substantially to mortality. Our therapy BIV201 is based on a drug that is not yet available in the US but is approved in about 50 countries to treat related complications of liver cirrhosis. The Company, formerly knows as NanoAntibiotics, Inc., recently acquired LAT Pharma LLC. This merger provided our lead development program, BIV201. Following a pre-investigational new drug meeting (“pre-IND”) with the FDA in early 2016, the Company is now assembling its IND package, and may commence a US clinical trial as early as 2017.

Industries: Hospital, Medical, Wellness
Description: RepScrubs is a time-sensitive vendor attire that assists hospitals' in increasing infection prevention and vendor management protocols.
Full Description: RepScrubs is a time-sensitive vendor attire that assists hospitals' in increasing infection prevention and vendor management protocols while reducing costs. The RepScrubs system includes an automated, cashless disposable scrub dispensing system (ScrubPort) that is placed in the hospital, and vendor tracking reports for hospital staff, that provide real-time reports about who has been to the operating room. RepScrubs offers healthcare facilities the monetary relief of having to supply scrub sets, coveralls, and lab coats to vendors visiting sterile departments. The RepScrubs program shifts this ongoing expense to the vendor and ensures every vendor entering a sterile patient care area is wearing clean scrubs dispensed from its onsite ScrubPort. RepScrubs was founded in 2013 and is based in Sanford, Florida, United States.

Industries: Dietary Supplements, Manufacturing, Nanotechnology, Nutraceutical, Personal Health, Product Research, Usability Testing, Wellness
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering
Description: Disruption Labs is a R&D and manufacturing firm that utilizes pharmaceutical grade nano-bioengineering and applies it to consumer products.
Full Description: Disruption Labs core strategy is a B2B business model, working in partnership with multi-national corporations and high-growth SMEs in the functional food & beverage  and clinical therapeutic markets to improve or bio-enhance existing products areas, or create entirely new disruptive products. Disruption Labs performs R&D, including pharmacokinetic studies, to demonstrate product safety and improved efficacy, facilitating new product development from the lab bench top to product scale-up through market - offering a true end-to-end solution.     In instance in which these strategic partnerships are not available, Disruption Labs plans to launch its own niche branded products, with R&D performed in-house to develop, scale-up and tech transfer, to bring to market scientifically validated, cutting-edge bio-enhanced product lines employing the proven, proprietary nanotechnology platform. Currently, Disruption Labs has developed a nano-liposomal CBD water soluble formulation, which utilizes its proprietary proven nanotechnology platform. The product is now sold under the brand Reset Bioscience, is currently being scientifically tested and validated for pharmacokinetic properties and manufactured under GMP-compliant conditions. Reset Biosciences has launched its first bio-enhanced, pharmaceutical grade, nano-liposomal product RESET Balance Jan 2019.   More on RESET  RESET Bioscience, a CBD and advanced wellness company, is the first to use pharmaceutical grade ingredients, and processes, for its pioneering CBD product.  After extensive research, testing and validation the company is launching  its debut product - RESET Balance, a 99.9% nano liposomal organic hemp CBD that compliments the body’s existing endocannabinoid system. The type of advanced nanotechnology used to produce this product uses liposomes as the trojan horse of drug delivery, providing approximately a 80% absorption/CBD effect at the cellular level, the highest in the industry today. With a commitment to quality, RESET Bioscience has spent $2M to double test for purity and efficacy, to introduce a product that will work as hard as you do to “reset” you to your baseline managing everyday stressors, including pain, anxiety, insomnia and more. RESET Balance is available in two flavors, neutral and peppermint, and is power packed with 300mg of organic triple tested CBD isolate, the most researched form of CBD on the market today, and importantly, with 0% THC. A unique attribute to RESET Balance is that it is white in color, due to the purity of the pharmaceutical grade lipids used. RESET has committed to self-regulate its developmental process, which means more safety and quality control measures have been taken to test and deliver a product that achieves real results, setting a new standard for CBD bioavailability through its proprietary nano liposomal delivery system.

Industries: Health Care, Medical, Personal Health, Rehabilitation, Therapeutics, Wellness
Description: We are first to market with our telemedicine based distance monitored physical therapy exercise (“DMpt”) program.
Full Description: We are first to market with our telemedicine based distance monitored physical therapy exercise (“DMpt”) program  which has been specifically designed to prevent pre-diabetic patients from becoming type 2 diabetic. Our program combines in-office direct-contact physical therapy eval uations, re-evaluations and physical performance testing with an on-line telemedicine exercise program that is fully monitored by our in-house physical therapists to increase patient engagement and program success. We also enroll our patients in an online healthy living nutrition and meal planning program.  Our initial services and business plan is specifically built around a 25-year partnership agreement with Millennium Healthcare, Inc. (MHCC) that has 450-plus physicians that currently see approximately 75,000 patients per week in over 200 practices in metropolitan New York and Northern New Jersey.  There are no current direct competitors. There are brick and mortar physical therapy business everywhere  (i.e.: U.S. Physical Therapy) that have only direct contact business models that have no telemedicine products and very low patient loads. There are also telemedicine physical therapy businesses such as  www.physiotec.ca that create and sells exercise video to physical therapists, but their business is not insurance reimbursable and there is little patient engagement. A majority of the MHI patients are sedentary and pre-diabetic with some coronary issues. Our initial contract covers the New York City and northern New Jersey tri-borough area (19.8 million people), the most populated region in the United States. Our Physical Therapy Program allows us to bill a patient’s insurance for traditional in-office patient visits and for our telemedicine exercise program sessions. Our low program cost to an insurer is up to approximately $3,000 per patient.

Industries: Fitness, Health Care, Medical Device, Wellness
Description: ReShape is a non-surgical procedure using dual balloon technology designed to transform weight loss.
Full Description: ReShape is a non-surgical procedure using dual balloon technology designed to transform weight loss when used in conjunction with diet and exercise, in obese patients with a Body Mass Index (BMI) of 30–40 kg/m2, and one or more obesity-related comorbid conditions. It is indicated for use in adult patients who have failed weight reduction with diet and exercise alone.  The ReShape Integrated Dual Balloon System is not recommended for patients with conditions that may increase the risk of poor results (e.g., prior gastrointestinal surgery with sequelae, prior open or laparoscopic bariatric surgery, inflammatory diseases of the GI tract, potential upper GI bleeding), who are unwilling to participate in an established medically-supervised diet and behavior modification program, who have alcohol or drug addictions, who receive daily prescribed treatment with aspirin, anti-inflammatory agents, anticoagulants or other gastric irritants, or who currently are or may be pregnant or breast-feeding.

Industries: Consumer Electronics, Fitness, Hardware, Health Care, Health Diagnostics, mHealth, Sensor, Software, Wearables
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Health Care, Mobile, Software, Sports
Description: Drink Smarter with BACtrack, The Leader in Breathalyzers.
Full Description: San Francisco-based BACtrack is the U.S. leader in breathalyzers, offering a full range of innovative products for both personal and professional use.  When BACtrack was founded in 2001, breathalyzers were primarily for law enforcement use and costs were high. Keith Nothacker, CEO and Founder of BACtrack, recognized that someone could be arrested with a Blood Alcohol Content of 0.08%, but that the general public had no way to test and measure their own BAC. He developed the first line of consumer breathalyzers.  PIONEERING AN INDUSTRY In 2004, BACtrack was the first company to ever receive US FDA 510(k) marketing clearance to legally sell breathalyzers to consumers for personal use. In fact, BACtrack worked with the FDA to create the evaluation and regulatory criteria for the personal breathalyzer category, which became the benchmark against which all other products were tested.  Since then, the company has worked to simplify the product, reduce the cost	of the technology, and	increase consumer awareness.	 Today, BACtrack offers a wide range of breathalyzers for both personal and professional use, and they are used by consumers, businesses, schools, clinics, hospitals, law enforcement, and even the U.S. military around the world.  DEFINING THE SMARTPHONE REVOLUTION In April, 2013, BACtrack launched the BACtrack Mobile Breathalyzer, the first smartphone breathalyzer to combine professional-grade fuel cell sensor technology, Bluetooth®-connectivity, and app-enabled features. With BACtrack Mobile, users can obtain a BAC result, view safety information and monitor how alcohol affects the body at each BAC point. BACtrack's unique ZeroLine® feature also shows a user approximately how long alcohol will remain in their bloodstream after consumption.  BACtrack released its second smartphone enabled breathalyzer in July, 2014. The BACtrack Vio Smartphone Breathalyzer has many of the same features as BACtrack Mobile, but is packaged in a compact, keychain design. INDUSTRY AWARDS AND RECOGNITION BACtrack's suite of products continue to be recognized by top research and media publications. BACtrack is featured in the 2013 December issue of Popular Science. It received the 2013 Best of What's New Award (Popular Science's top honor) for its innovation in health. Popular Science stated BACtrack and the other award recipients are "poised to change the world."  In April 2014, the BACtrack Keychain Breathalyzer and BACtrack Mobile received Car and Driver's highest ratings in an industry wide comparison testing of the most accurate personal breathalyzers. CNET rated BACtrack Mobile as "very good" on the usability scale.  In the 2014 Edison Awards, BACtrack Mobile won a Bronze medal for the Security and Safety Category. It also won an Australian Good Design Award for being one of the best designed and most innovative products of the year across a range of fields and industries.  BACTRACK CONSUMPTION REPORT In June 2014, BACtrack was the first company to release alcohol related data to the public concerning US drinking habits via the BACtrack Consumption Report. The report is compiled from Blood	Alcohol	Content	(BAC) data collected anonymously via BACtrack Smartphone Breathalyzers, and will be updated regularly to provide insight into	alcohol	consumption patterns around the world. The goal	is	to	enlighten	the	general	public	on	alcohol	consumption	habits	so	that	 they 	become more responsible	drinkers. RETAIL PARTNERSHIPS BACtrack has forged extensive partnerships around the globe with the major retail and ecommerce stores. BACtrack breathalyzers are carried in over 10,000 retail locations across North America, including Best Buy, Costco, and Walgreen's, and are available at major online retailers such as Amazon, Walmart.com, Brookstone, and Drugstore.com. BACtrack products are also available in over 25 countries and 4 continents.  PRODUCT OFFERINGS The BACtrack product line includes the following: Smartphone Breathalyzers: BACtrack Mobile Smartphone Breathalyzer, BACtrack Vio Smartphone Breathalyzer BACtrack smartphone breathalyzers wirelessly connect to your iOS or Android device via Bluetooth®, and with the free BACtrack app, a user can save, track, and optionally share their BAC results. Professional Series Breathalyzers:  BACtrack S80 Pro, BACtrack S75 Pro, BACtrack Element.  Each of the Professional Series breathalyzers is equipped with the proprietary Xtend Fuel Cell Sensing Technology, which deliver consistent, reliable BAC results with police-grade accuracy, from 0.000 to 0.400% BAC. BACtrack Mobile is also a Professional Series model. Elite Series Breathalyzers:  BACtrack Keychain, BACtrack Go, BACtrack S35.  Each of the BACtrack Elite Series Breathalyzers are equipped with proprietary Advanced MicroCheck Sensors for high performance and accurate, reliable results. BACtrack Vio is also an Elite Series model.

Description: ETHOS is the ultimate yoga fitness hybrid experience with all one needs.
Full Description: ETHOS is the ultimate yoga fitness hybrid experience with all one needs in one convenient location. We see ourselves as alchemists; divisors of new methods, mixing up unique mind/body workout combinations to achieve deep transformation at all levels. For us, yoga encompasses all our offerings as they are methods with the goal of finding each person's authenticity. Tired of the divide between the yoga, fitness and science worlds, we created a space that brings them together for optimal MIND/BODY training. We believe there are people like us who love yoga and sports and no longer want to think of them as separate activities. ETHOS husband and wife co-founders feel passionate about creating a sacred space without pretence for people to explore their own authenticity through movement of all shades for people of all ages and levels. Both are Cambridge graduates (PhD in Biotechnology/Neuroscience and MPhil in Indian Philosophy/Sanskrit) who have spent more than 30 years in professional sports, dance, science and academia and remain deeply involved with ETHOS. For them it is essential to teach and practice daily with their students. It is why we are committed to being an independent studio and not a corporate. It’s not about the bottom-line, but about changing people’s lives up close and personal. This is how we maintain a fresh and fluid approach that’s ever evolving so our members never plateau. Our product is backed by the credibility and integrity of our 40+ strong team, each one a master of their field; from yoga gurus to ex-professional dancers and cyclists, military officers, Cambridge scholars and scientists. ETHOS is the ultimate yoga fitness hybrid experience with all one needs in one convenient location. We see ourselves as alchemists; divisors of new methods, mixing up unique mind/body workout combinations to achieve deep transformation at all levels. For us, yoga encompasses all our offerings as they are methods with the goal of finding each person's authenticity. This means giving each individual a way to personalize their physical, mental and creative expressions. At ETHOS studios you have every possible workout combination at your fingertips, so start experimenting with new formulas to achieve your goals.

Industries: Health Care, Medical, Wellness
Description: Lifefactory produces BPA-free glass bottles, baby bottles, water bottles, teethers, glass bottles with silicone sleeves, and teethers.
Full Description: Lifefactory designs healthy housewares solutions for modern life. The Company brings the purity of glass, the protection of silicone, and the power of color to a full line of products designed for everyday use by healthy families. The Lifefactory line began with baby bottles, and has grown to include iconic adult water bottles, wine and beverage glasses and oven-friendly food storage. All components are made in North America or Europe. The Company is privately held and headquartered in Sausalito, CA. Learn more at http://www.lifefactory.com.

Industries: Fitness, Health Care, Personal Health
Description: Envision Healthcare offers various facility-based physician staffing and health-related management services.
Full Description: Envision Healthcare is a Healthcare Benefits Manager that specializes in the creation, development and implementation of Consumer Driven Health Care plans. Our goal is to change the way healthcare is financed and delivered in America. We do this by providing employers and employees the tools and information to make wise healthcare choices.

Industries: Health Care, Medical, Medical Device, Personal Health
Description: 7 Springs Orthopedics is a comprehensive practice treating all types of muscle, bone, and joint pain.
Full Description: 7 Springs Orthopedics is a comprehensive practice treating all types of muscle, bone, and joint pain. It offers a warm, inviting environment that has everything necessary to offer their patients the precise care and treatment they deserve. Team members are committed to ensuring their patients the best possible experience. Their commitment to providing highly individualized care shows in the time and attention they give to each patient. They ensure everyone receives thorough explanations of care options and have all of their questions answered. The 7 Springs Orthopedics team always considers nonsurgical treatments whenever possible and strives for the fastest recovery possible with the least amount of physical and financial burden.  It was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Brentwood, Tennessee.

Industries: Financial Services, FinTech, Fitness
Description: Paceline is a health and wellness platform that rewards physical activity with financial benefits.
Full Description: Paceline is a fitness rewards platform that adds financial benefit to the physical activity. It is out to reinvent the financial industry with the aim of making it more technology-enabled and better at engaging with consumers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

Industries: Consulting, Fitness, Health Care
Description: Virtual Health Partners offers coaching from a team of  nutrition specialists.
Full Description: Virtual Health Partners offers coaching from a team of nutrition specialists. VHP also offers on-demand access to fitness, nutrition, and lifestyle modification videos, classes, and more. They also have live classes, streamed weekly, covering a variety of wellness topics. Virtual Health Partners enables people with busy schedules to increase energy, metabolism, and focus all day long.

Industries: Cannabis, Fitness, Health Care
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Food and Beverage, Health Care, Sports
Description: Flora California operates as a vertically integrated seed-to-solution cannabis company.
Full Description: Flora California operates as a vertically integrated seed-to-solution cannabis company.  With over 15 acres of full-spectrum Dutch indoor greenhouse facilities, it produces a steady stream of safe, consistent, cannabis products. The company is driven by a mission is to deliver only the purest cannabis through our state-of-the-art cultivation campuses and purpose-driven product innovation to promote happier and healthier lives for all.
